statements: DELETE FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Network' AND id = 1;
DELETE FROM vulnerability_assessment WHERE id = 100 AND severity = 'High';
DELETE FROM remediation WHERE regulations_id = 200 AND date_completed < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Internal Exploit' AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM security_weaknesses WHERE severity_level = 'Critical' AND affected_system = 'Database Server';
DELETE FROM assessment_results WHERE remediation_id IN (SELECT remediation_id FROM remediations WHERE remediation_date < '2023-01-01');
